hit_dmg_u: %1$s pierces your %2$s with its beak, drawing blood!
hit_dmg_npc: %1$s pierces <npcname>'s flesh with its beak, drawing blood!
miss_msg_u: %1$s attempts to pierce your %2$s with its beak, but you dodge the attack!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries to pierce <npcname> with its beak, but they dodge just in time!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s tries to pierce your %2$s with its beak, but your armor holds strong!
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s tries to pierce <npcname>'s armor with its beak, but it fails to penetrate!
